title: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: When deleting items from the Coolbar in Build 2002071610021, the layout gets corrupted. After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of staying on the second row, the Launch item is moved to the first row. This behavior is incorrect and the Launch item should remain on the second row.
OB: Press the Delete button. The first item on the second row is deleted. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the deletion occurs.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR:
1. Open Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Verify that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item remains on the second row.
